idea-plugin.name: Database Inspector
idea-plugin.description: This plugin enables the moor inspector ui inside the IDE. Use the moor_inspector dart/flutter library to connect and inspect your databases during development. After running your dart/flutter app, use the connect button to discover and connect your process/device and start inspecting!
